product_description: Boredom is never an option with the Cedar Cove Swing Set by Backyard Discovery. This premium outdoor swing set combines exciting active play features with imaginative spaces for endless adventures. The rock wall offers an engaging climbing expedition, while the easy-access step ladder with flat rungs and large metal handles provides an alternative route for confident climbing. Up in the spacious clubhouse, kids can create artwork on the built-in chalkboard, navigate voyages with the pretend telescope, or plan their next quest from the balcony lookout. Designed with a dual slide configuration, adventure awaits with the twisty spiral tube slide or the 10-foot speedy wave slide. The shaded playhouse below becomes a busy bistro with a toy grill, sink, and play food, while two built-in benches create the perfect spot for sharing snacks and stories. There’s plenty of room for sky-high adventures with our patented swing beam extender that creates wider lanes for the two belt swings and web disc swing, letting multiple kids join the fun safely. Plus, this wooden swing set arrives ready to assemble with guided instructions through the interactive BILT app. Bring playground magic home with the Cedar Cove Swing Set, where every day brings new adventures.

product_description: The Appleton Swing Set by KidKraft is perfect for small spaces. With a compact footprint of just 80 sq. ft., Appleton packs miles of fun into every well-crafted inch—accommodating up to six lively kids. Starting with an exhilarating high-rail wave slide, the adventure continues with a quick scramble up the rock wall ladder to the shade of the gable-roofed upper deck. There, enclosed by protective side slats, children can safely draw or write on the vinyl chalkwall, survey their magic kingdoms or just sit and play. Outside, a trip to the sandbox for archaeological digs or a ride on one of the two sturdy belt swings provides plenty of fresh air activity. Adults will appreciate the high-quality, 100% premium wood construction and ease of assembly. Appleton is one small wonder that packs a big punch. For children aged 3 years to 7 years.
